On August 28, 2025, On August 28, 2025,Jio Financial Services (JIOFIN)held its Second Annual General Meeting (AGM) and made several substantial corporate announcements .

Key corporate developments from the AGM:

Expansion of business strategy:At the AGM, chairman K.V. Kamath emphasized that the 2024-2025 fiscal year was pivotal for scaling the business, securing regulatory approvals, and forming new partnerships. The company highlighted ambitious expansion plans for its financial services.

Launch of "Savings Pro":Its subsidiary, Jio Payments Bank, announced it would launch "Savings Pro," a new savings account that automatically invests idle funds into overnight mutual funds for higher returns. The product is described as a first in India.

Digital innovation:JIOFIN revealed it had implemented an advanced data intelligence engine during FY25, which will underpin personalized and intelligent financial services for its customers.

Update on partnerships:The company provided updates on its existing strategic partnerships with global financial players like BlackRock and Allianz.

Lending business growth:JIOFIN announced significant growth in its lending business, with its Assets Under Management (AUM) rising to â‚¹11,665 crore.

First-ever dividend:The company's board approved its first-ever dividend payment for the 2024-25 fiscal year, following its post-listing AGM. The dividend record date was previously set for August 11, 2025.

Appointment of auditor:An appointment of a secretarial auditor was also disclosed on this day.

On August 28, 2025,Jio Financial Services (JIOFIN)held its Second Annual General Meeting (AGM) and made several substantial corporate announcements
